name: DashCam
description: GD screenshot/recorder mod, has different filters too!

flash-title.name: Camera Flash
flash-title.description: Configure camera flash effects for screenshots and recordings.

camera-flash.description: Enables a camera flash effect on the screen when taking a screenshot. If enabled, the flash may be visible in images when capturing multiple screenshots in quick succession.

flash-sound.description: Plays a camera shutter sound effect when a screenshot is taken. Disable if you prefer silent captures.

aesthetics-settings.name: Aesthetics
aesthetics-settings.description: Customize the visual appearance of your recordings and screenshots, including filters, shaders, and other aesthetic options.

filter.name: Filter
filter.description: Select a filter to apply to your screenshots and recordings. Filters can change the mood and appearance of your captures.

shader.name: Shader
shader.description: Select a shader to apply to your screenshots and recordings. Shaders can change the visual style and effects of your captures.
